Aries.description: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac, and its natives are known for their fiery passion and initiative. They are natural leaders and are always ready for action.

Mars.description: Mars represents action, energy, and assertiveness. It governs desires and instincts for survival. Mars is linked to power, physicality, and ambition.

1st_house.title: House of Self
1st_house.description: The 1st house represents the self, personality, and outward behavior. It is associated with your appearance, health, and the first impression you give to others.

conjunction.description: The conjunction aspect occurs when two planets are very close together in the same sign. This aspect amplifies the energies of the planets involved.
